menu.name: Guacamole and Chips
menu.description: Creamy avocado dip made with fresh avocados, tomatoes, onions, cilantro, lime juice, and served with crispy tortilla chips.

menu.name: Queso Fundido
menu.description: Melted Oaxaca cheese with your choice of chorizo or mushrooms, served with warm tortillas for dipping.

menu.name: Taquitos
menu.description: Crispy rolled corn tortillas filled with seasoned chicken or beef, topped with lettuce, cheese, guacamole, and salsa.

menu.name: Ceviche
menu.description: Fresh fish or shrimp marinated in lime juice, mixed with diced tomatoes, onions, cilantro, and avocado. Served chilled with tortilla chips.

menu.name: Nachos Supreme
menu.description: A mountain of tortilla chips smothered in melted cheese, topped with your choice of meat or beans, jalapenos, pico de gallo, sour cream, and guacamole.

menu.name: Tacos al Pastor
menu.description: Marinated and grilled pork, served in soft corn tortillas with fresh pineapple, onions, and cilantro. A classic street food favorite.

menu.name: Chiles Rellenos
menu.description: Roasted poblano peppers stuffed with a savory blend of cheese, then coated in a light egg batter and fried to perfection.

menu.name: Sopes
menu.description: Thick handmade corn tortillas topped with refried beans, shredded chicken or beef, lettuce, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.

menu.name: Empanadas
menu.description: Golden-fried pastries filled with your choice of beef, chicken, or cheese, served with a side of salsa.

menu.name: Mexican Fiesta Platter
menu.description: A combination of mini chimichangas, taquitos, and cheese quesadillas, served with guacamole, sour cream, and pico de gallo.

menu.name: Enchilada Trio
menu.description: Sample three of our delicious enchilada flavors: verde, roja, and mole, served with rice and beans.

menu.name: Taco Trio
menu.description: Mix and match three tacos of your choice, served with rice and beans.

menu.name: Taste of Mexico
menu.description: Experience the flavors of Mexico with a tamale, chile relleno, and carne asada, served with rice and beans.

menu.name: Enchiladas Verdes
menu.description: Corn tortillas rolled and filled with shredded chicken, topped with a tangy green tomatillo sauce, melted cheese, and a dollop of sour cream.

menu.name: Carne Asada
menu.description: Grilled and thinly sliced marinated steak, served with rice, beans, guacamole, and tortillas. A hearty and flavorful main course.

menu.name: Burritos
menu.description: Large flour tortillas filled with your choice of grilled chicken, beef, or vegetables, along with rice, beans, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.

menu.name: Pozole
menu.description: Traditional Mexican soup made with hominy, tender pork, and a flavorful broth, garnished with shredded cabbage, radishes, and lime.

menu.name: Tamales
menu.description: Traditional Mexican cornmeal dumplings filled with seasoned chicken or pork, wrapped in corn husks and steamed to perfection.

menu.name: Chimichangas
menu.description: Deep-fried flour tortillas filled with your choice of shredded beef or chicken, topped with melted cheese, lettuce, salsa, and sour cream.

menu.name: Mole Poblano
menu.description: Tender chicken smothered in a rich and complex mole sauce made with chili peppers, chocolate, and spices, served with rice and warm tortillas.

menu.name: Mexican Rice
menu.description: Fluffy rice cooked with tomatoes, onions, and spices.

menu.name: Refried Beans
menu.description: Pinto beans cooked until creamy and seasoned to perfection.

menu.name: Churros
menu.description: Fried dough pastries coated in cinnamon sugar, served with chocolate dipping sauce.

menu.name: Tres Leches Cake
menu.description: Light and moist sponge cake soaked in three kinds of milk and topped with whipped cream and strawberries.

menu.name: Horchata
menu.description: Sweet and creamy rice-based drink flavored with cinnamon and vanilla.

menu.name: Agua Fresca
menu.description: Refreshing fruit-infused water in flavors like watermelon, pineapple, or hibiscus.

menu.name: Mexican Soda
menu.description: Imported sodas in various flavors like Jarritos, Sidral Mundet, or Coca-Cola Mexicana.
